replies.body: Awww, now i feel all warm and fuzzy....    Or is that the brain weasles?
H...Haven't you been vaccinated against brain weasles?

Ha! Everyone knows those vaccinations _cause_ brain weasels!
Not sure, hey would anyone like some Lung Mittens? They're fresh
Don't forget that he is riding a derpy, coward lizard.
I am literally buying him for his VO alone. His kit is interesting, but I don't if I'll be a huge fan of it or not. The VO makes getting him worth it either way :p

> [{quoted}](name=Blue Moon Wolf,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=gc6hVd9V,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-07-26T09:19:08.132+0000)
>
> I am literally buying him for his VO alone. His kit is interesting, but I don't if I'll be a huge fan of it or not. The VO makes getting him worth it either way :p

I think his kit looks fun. Kinda like D.Va. And it's like I said a week or so ago, he has what the last two are missing.

Sol has personality to spare, but a kit as dull as dishwater to play.
Taliyah has a fun kit, but has less personality than that rock she surfs on.

This guy has both!
